sentences.en: "Gratification" and "gratitude" have the same etymological root.
sentences.cn: gratification和gratitude的词源相同。

sentences.en: A stream has its source, a tree has its root.
sentences.cn: 水有源, 木有本.

sentences.en: Allergies are at the root of a lot of health problems.
sentences.cn: 过敏是许多健康问题的根源。

sentences.en: Bridges over railroad tracks root danger out in crossing.
sentences.cn: 铁轨上空的天桥排除了穿行中的危险.

sentences.en: Her ankle caught on a root, and she almost lost her balance.
sentences.cn: 她的脚踝被树根绊了一下，差点摔倒。

sentences.en: his mother rooted him on enthusiastically from ringside.
sentences.cn: 他的母亲从台边区拼命为他加油。

sentences.en: it is a moral question at root.
sentences.cn: 这实质上是个道德问题。

sentences.en: Kevin buys a root beer.
sentences.cn: 凯文买了一瓶根汁汽水。

sentences.en: Let's go and root for our college baseball team.
sentences.cn: 我们去给校棒球队加油吧

sentences.en: New shrubs will root easily in summer.
sentences.cn: 新灌木在夏季容易生根。

sentences.en: Root ginger has been used medicinally for centuries.
sentences.cn: 几百年来姜根一直作为药用。

sentences.en: Root the cuttings in a heated propagator.
sentences.cn: 把插条放在加热的培育箱里生根。

sentences.en: The fence posts took root and grew into the earth!
sentences.cn: 篱笆生了根,伸入土中.

sentences.en: The forces of National Socialism were transforming Germany root and branch.
sentences.cn: 纳粹主义势力当时正在彻底改变德国。

sentences.en: The generals have to root out traitors.
sentences.cn: 将军们得把叛国者全部铲除。

sentences.en: The organization has been transformed root and branch by its new leaders.
sentences.cn: 这个组织已被它的新领导人彻底改变了性质

sentences.en: The phobia may have its root in a childhood trauma.
sentences.cn: 恐惧症可能源于童年时期的创伤.

sentences.en: the proposals struck at the roots of community life.
sentences.cn: 这些建议根绝了社区生活。

sentences.en: the whole of this club is rooting for him.
sentences.cn: 这个俱乐部里大家都在支持他。

sentences.en: These plants produce a number of thin roots.
sentences.cn: 这些植物会长出一些细根。

sentences.en: They were treating symptoms and not the root cause.
sentences.cn: 他们是治标不治本。

sentences.en: This lack of recognition was at the root of the dispute.
sentences.cn: 这种不被承认就是这次纷争的根源。

sentences.en: tree roots
sentences.cn: 树根

sentences.en: We got to the root of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们找到了问题的根源。

words.tran_cn: 无根的；无根据的；无所寄托的
拔根者；挖土机；用鼻拱土的动物
生根；使站立不动；牢固地树立（root的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)支持，赞助，声援（个人或团体参加比赛或接受挑战）
(北美，非正式)为…欢呼，喝彩；为…鼓气

phrases.phrase: strike at the root (或 roots) of

trans.tran_cn: 根（部），根源，起源，祖籍，词根
trans.tran_en: the part of a plant or tree that grows under the ground and gets water from the soil
